meanings.definition: In a way that causes annoyance or frustration.
meanings.sent1: The slow internet connection vexingly made it hard to finish my homework.
meanings.sent2: She waited vexingly for the bus that was running late.
meanings.sent3: The cat vexingly knocked over the vase, spilling water everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The constant buzzing of the fly was vexingly distracting during the meeting.
meanings.sent5: The never-ending traffic jam was vexingly frustrating for all the drivers.

meanings.definition: In a manner that is irritating or bothersome.
meanings.sent1: The loud music from the party next door vexingly kept me awake all night.
meanings.sent2: The squeaky door vexingly disturbed the peaceful atmosphere of the library.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel vexingly stole all the birdseed from the feeder.
meanings.sent4: The dripping faucet vexingly echoed through the empty house.
meanings.sent5: The constant beeping of the alarm clock was vexingly annoying in the morning.
